name: CatGame
description:
catgame! interact with two cats in a back garden.

click the food bowl to feed the cats
click and hold on a cat to pet them

cat sounds made by dutchess

bonus debug controls:
backspace - reset game
1 - make orange cat hungry
2 - make grey cat hungry
3 - make orange cat wander
4 - make grey cat wander
5 - make orange cat rest 
6 - make grey cat rest
7 - make orange cat meow 
8 - make grey cat meow
